name: The MIRЯ0Я Dimension
description:
The MIRЯ0Я Dimension

Your ship is equipped with the MIRЯ0Я system, allowing you to control the other ships in your squadron at the same time.

Unfortunately, the system is still experimental and may take you in and out of the MIRЯ0Я Dimension from time to time as you're battling the next wave of alien invaders threatening the Earth.

So long as one ship of your squadron is still alive, you or your wingmen will continue the fight!

Controls:

DesktopMobileRe(Start)EnterTapMoveWASD or Arrows
(ZQSD on French keyboard)SwipeFireEnterAutofire onPausePN/A

Web Monetization:

Coil subscribers get 1 extra ship in their squadron!

Notes & Special thanks

This game was made in 13 days for the Gamedev.js Jam 2021 on the theme "Mirror". It rolls its own vanilla Javascript game engine and weight 16Kb. A future version may feature what was left on the editing room floor (bosses, levels, music and sound effects).

Many thanks to Sebastien Benard for creating LDtk.io, which was used to create the infinite level appearing in the game.
Special thanks to Andrzej Mazur for running the Gamedev.js & JS13KGames jams year after year.
